tool_description: Analyzes overall conveyor system performance by combining multiple metrics to provide comprehensive system health assessment.

system_id.description: Unique identifier of the conveyor system

benchmark_period_hours.description: Historical benchmark period for comparison in hours (24-8760)

weight_factors.description: Weight factors for different metrics: [throughput, efficiency, reliability, energy]

error_messages: System not found: The specified system_id does not exist in the monitoring database.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_hours must be between 1 and 168 hours.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data available for the specified analysis period.
Invalid benchmark period: benchmark_period_hours must be between 24 and 8760 hours.
Invalid thresholds: performance_thresholds must contain 3 values in ascending order (0-100).
Invalid weight factors: weight_factors must contain 4 values that sum to 1.0.
usage: Specify system_id and analysis_period_hours. Optionally customize analysis parameters and thresholds. The tool provides comprehensive performance metrics.
